True Facts

   R.D. Burman revolutionised filmy music of Indian films
 Varied, wild and eclectic scores of Rahul Dev Burman are credited with defining the globally popular sound of Indian film music. His style and techniques are followed by composers till date. Bollywood film music which is now internationally popular as colorful, electronic dance producers...

   Satyajit Ray is India’s first globally acknowledged filmmaker
 There are very few Indians who have been addressed with Leonardo Da Vinci’s title of a Renaissance Man, Satyajit Ray stands tallest amongst all of them. Satyajit Ray is a cultural icon worldwide as his movies depicted the shades and tones of human life with a subtlety like none before....

   Arjun Rampal: Small town marvel excelled as supermodel and actor

   Danny Denzongpa: the most stylish villain in Bollywood
